subject: Re: Changing junit.framework.Assert to instance methods
msgSnippet: Vladimir, I needed to make Assert.fail(...) an instance method so I could override it and allow for multiple failures. http://sourceforge.net/projects/jfunc
messageBody:
Vladimir,

I needed to make Assert.fail(...) an instance method so I could
override it and allow for multiple failures.
http://sourceforge.net/projects/jfunc took the same approach.

Cheers,

David
--- In junit@y..., Vladimir Bossicard <vladimir@b...> wrote:
> > We had to change all methods in Assert class from static to
instance
> > for functional testing
>
>
> Can you give an example as why assertions shouldn't be static
anymore?
>
> -Vladimir
